sentence.text: ` Can it really work ? " enquired his startled colleague .
Gus said : ` Of course ! " in a slightly startled voice , and visibly withdrew his vision and his thoughts from some distant preoccupation in which she had no part .
They burst in on the somewhat startled signalman who was puzzled by the dramatic appearance of the two familiar faces .
The man turned round and looked at Robyn with startled eyes .
Their heads were close together and as he appeared they all looked up in unison with startled faces and fell silent .
His eyes were so far out of his head that he looked like a startled grasshopper .
She looked startled when I snapped at her : ` What have they worked out ? "
The girl looked startled .
He seemed startled to see me as if applicants , once embarked on musical offices , rarely returned .
Maurice seemed startled .
I am startled to find myself addressing you instead .
Jinny was so startled that she nearly kicked the bucket over .
Corbett stopped his horse and turned to the startled Ranulf .
She gave him a startled glance .
And having made the mistake a bird seldom gets a second chance , for the startled butterfly takes off , not in the direction the bird might have expected but , apparently , backwards .
He laughed at Claudia 's startled expression .
No less a person than Gloria Estefan rang my startled publisher before leaving London , to order the Ology book , because she was crazy for the commercials .
Ana started to laugh and Mitch gave her a startled glance and then laughed ruefully too , giving her a hug .
Then his startled gaze met the glowing eyes above the white patch of the handkerchief the man was holding at his mouth .
` About what , dear ? " she asked in a startled voice .
Before she could utter the cry of alarm which rose in her throat his hand had closed over her mouth , and Paige 's startled eyes blinked at him over the top .
Lucy felt startled , but forced herself to remain calm .
Herman , startled but pleased , moved in , only to be disconcerted as Erika pushed him away .
Israel and I pushed by the startled and helpless usher and swaggered into the arena dressed in our Mau Mau uniforms .
